document_data.name: Treth Halonter
document_data.deathnotes: or earlier; killed by fellow adventurers
document_data.turnednotes: or earlier; rose as a [[blueflame ghost]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Treth Halonter''' was a [[blueflame ghost]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], once an adventurer among [[the Nine]], in the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He had been bound to the ''[[Wyverntongue Chalice]]''.
document_data.Personality: He was a little less talkative than Relve Langral.
document_data.Possessions: He carried a sword, even as a ghost.
document_data.Description: He was taller than [[Relve Langral]]; while a blueflame ghost, he smiled constantly.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|307-308|29}}
document_data.Relationships: While human, Treth Halonter had been one of [[the Nine]], a band of adventurers led by [[Laeral Silverhand]]. As a blueflame ghost, he was controlled by [[Marlin Stormserpent]], and then by [[Cymmarra]], a sorceress.
document_data.Abilities: When a blueflame ghost, Treth Halonter could walk through walls, and drain away the life force of the living. He could not, however, be made to attack another blueflame ghost.
